title: Amy's apple pie
ingredients: ['200g flour', '125ml vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons cold milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '150g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '60g plain flour', '6 apples, cored and sliced', '100g caster sugar', '125g butter']
